children.heading: Architecture Reference for Cooperative and Intelligent Transportation (ARC-IT)
Compatibility with Versions Prior to NTCIP 1203 v04
Physical View of the Reference Architecture
monitor the status of the DMS
DMS Technologies
children.additional: Note that certain combinations of the following technologies might not be supported by any product.

children.heading: DMS Display Matrix Configuration
children.additional:
The DMS shall be ___ millimeters wide (0..65535) and ___ millimeters high (0..65535), inclusive of borders.

The Sign's Border shall be at least ___ millimeters wide (0..65535) and ___ millimeters high (0..65535).
The pitch between pixels shall be at least ___ millimeters (0..255).
children.name: b

children.additional: The sign shall be ___ pixels wide (0..65535) and ___ pixels high (0..65535).
children.name: i

children.additional: The sign shall have ____ lines with each line being ___ pixels wide and ___ pixels high.
children.name: ii

children.additional: The sign shall be ___ characters wide and ___ characters high with each character being ___ pixels wide (0..255), ___ pixels high (0..255).
children.name: iii

children.heading: DMS Display Support of Physical Beacons
children.additional:
The DMS shall support the following Beacon configuration:___________

Select one from the following (or define your own):

  • none
  • one Beacon
  • two Beacons with Sync-ed Flash
  • two Beacons with Opposing Flash
  • four Beacons with Sync-ed Flash
  • four Beacons with Alternate Row Flash
  • four Beacons with Alternate Column Flash
  • four Beacons with Alternate Diagonal Flash
  • four Beacons with No Sync-ed Flash
  • one Beacon Strobe
  • two Beacon Strobe
  • four Beacon Strobe

children.heading: Determine Maximum Graphic Size
children.additional: The DMS shall support a maximum graphic size of ___________ bytes.

children.heading: Determine Available Graphics Memory

children.additional: The DMS shall support all flash on times from ____ tenths of a second (0..255) to ____ tenths of a second (0..255) in ____ tenths of a second increments. The DMS shall support all flash off times from ____ tenths of a second (0..255) to ____ tenths of a second (0..255) in ____ tenths of a second increments.

children.heading: Configure Default Page On-Time and Page Off-Time
children.additional: The DMS shall support all page on times from ____ tenths of a second (1..255) to ____ tenths of a second (1..255) in ____ tenths of a second increments. The DMS shall support all page off times from ____ tenths of a second (0..255) to ____ tenths of a second (0..255) in ____ tenths of a second increments.

children.heading: Support for a Number of Graphics

attributesChanged.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Management Station
    participant DMS
    note over Management Station,DMS: Preconditions: The management station shall be aware of the number of<br/>fonts supported by the DMS, the characters supported by the DMS,<br/>the font to be configured, and the characters within the font to be configured.
    Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
    alt fontStatus.x != ('inUse' OR 'permanent' OR 'unmanaged')
      Management Station->>DMS: set(fontStatus.x = 'modifyReq')
      Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
      alt fontStatus.x == ('modifying')
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontHeight.x)
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontNumber.x, fontName.x, fontCharSpacing.x, fontLineSpacing.x)
        loop for each character to be defined
          Management Station->>DMS: set(characterWidth.x.y, characterBitmap.x.y)
        end
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontStatus.x = 'readyForUse')
    end
    end
    note over Management Station,DMS: Where<br/>x=font index<br/>y=character number

children.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Management Station
    participant DMS
    note over Management Station,DMS: Preconditions: The management station shall be aware of the number of<br/>fonts supported by the DMS, the characters supported by the DMS,<br/>the font to be configured, and the characters within the font to be configured.
    Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
    alt fontStatus.x != ('inUse' OR 'permanent' OR 'unmanaged')
      Management Station->>DMS: set(fontStatus.x = 'modifyReq')
      Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
      alt fontStatus.x == ('modifying')
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontHeight.x)
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontNumber.x, fontName.x, fontCharSpacing.x, fontLineSpacing.x)
        loop for each character to be defined
          Management Station->>DMS: set(characterWidth.x.y, characterBitmap.x.y)
        end
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontStatus.x = 'readyForUse')
        loop until (fontStatus.x != 'calculatingID') or timeout
          Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
        end
      end
    end
    note over Management Station,DMS: Where<br/>x=font index<br/>y=character number

sequenceDiagram
    participant Management Station
    participant DMS
    note over Management Station,DMS: Preconditions: The management station shall be aware of the number of<br/>fonts supported by the DMS, the characters supported by the DMS,<br/>the font to be configured, and the characters within the font to be configured.
    Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
    alt fontStatus.x != ('inUse' OR 'permanent' OR 'unmanaged')
      Management Station->>DMS: set(fontStatus.x = 'modifyReq')
      Management Station->>DMS: get(fontStatus.x)
      alt fontStatus.x == ('modifying')
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontHeight.x)
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontNumber.x, fontName.x, fontCharSpacing.x, fontLineSpacing.x)
        loop for each character to be defined
          Management Station->>DMS: set(characterWidth.x.y, characterBitmap.x.y)
        end
        Management Station->>DMS: set(fontStatus.x = 'readyForUse')

    note over Management Station,DMS: Where<br/>x=font index<br/>y=character number

children.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Management Station
    participant DMS
    
  note over Management Station,DMS: Preconditions: The management station shall be aware of the number of<br/>graphics supported by the DMS.
    Management Station->>DMS: get(dmsGraphicStatus.x)
    alt dmsGraphicStatus.x != ('inUse' OR 'permanent')
      Management Station->>DMS: set(dmsGraphicStatus.x = 'modifyReq')
      Management Station->>DMS: get(dmsGraphicStatus.x)
      alt dmsGraphicStatus.x == ('modifying')
        Management Station->>DMS: set(dmsGraphicHeight.x)
        Management Station->>DMS: set(dmsGraphicNumber.x, dmsGraphicName.x, dmsGraphicHeight.x, dmsGraphicWidth.x,<br/>dmsGraphicType.x, dmsGraphicTransparentEnabled.x, dmsGraphicTransparentColor.x)
        loop for each graphic block to be defined
          Management Station->>DMS: set(dmsGraphicBlockBitmap.x.y)
        end
        Management Station->>DMS: set(dmsGraphicStatus.x = 'readyForUse')
        loop until (dmsGraphicStatus.x != 'calculatingID') or timeout
          Management Station->>DMS: get(dmsGraphicStatus.x)
        end
      end
    end
    note over Management Station,DMS: Where<br/>x=dmsGraphicIndex or dmsGraphicBitmapIndex<br/>y=dmsGraphicBlockNumber

children.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Management Station
    participant DMS
    
    Management Station->>DMS: set(dmsIllumBrightnessValues.0)
    note over DMS: If there is an error with the<br/>dmsIllumBrightnessValues<br/>then the DMS will set an<br/>appropriate error for<br/>dmsBrightnessValuesError.0.<br/>Otherwise<br/>dmsBrightnessValuesError.0<br/>is set to 'noError'.
    alt dmsIllumBrightnessValues.0 == 'genErr'
      Management Station->>DMS: get(dmsIllumBrightnessValuesError.0)
    end

children.heading: Monitoring the Status of the DMS
General Description of the Font State Machine

children.text:
@startuml
note as N1 
rejectMessageActivation {
   activateMessageError = syntaxMULTI
   dmsMultiSyntaxError = graphicNotDefined
   return inconsistentValue }
end note

state notUsed
notUsed : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = notUsedReq)/
notUsed --> modifying : set(dmsGraphicStatus = modifyReq)
notUsed : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
notUsed : event set(any data for graphic)/ notWritable 
notUsed : event activate message using graphic/ See note: rejectMessageActivation()

modifying --> notUsed : set(dmsGraphicStatus = notUsedReq)
modifying : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = modifyReq)/
modifying --> calculatingID : set(dmsGraphicStatus = readyForUseReq) 
modifying : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
modifying : event set(any data for graphic)/ process
modifying : event activate message using graphic/ See note: rejectMessageActivation()
modifying : event set(dmsGraphicHeight = different value)/ dmsGraphicBlockBitmap => zero length
modifying : event set(dmsGraphicWidth = different value)/ dmsGraphicBlockBitmap => zero length
modifying : event set(dmsGraphicType = different value)/ dmsGraphicBlockBitmap => zero length

calculatingID : do/ udpate dmsGraphicID
calculatingID --> readyForUse
calculatingID --> notUsed : set(dmsGraphicStatus = notUsedReq)
calculatingID : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
calculatingID : event set(any data for graphic)/ notWritable
calculatingID : event activate message using graphic/ See note: rejectMessageActivation()

readyForUse --> notUsed : set(dmsGraphicStatus = notUsedReq)
readyForUse --> modifying : set(dmsGraphicStatus =modifyReq)
readyForUse : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = readyForUseReq)/
readyForUse : event set(dmsGraphicStatus = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
readyForUse : event set(any data for graphic)/ notWritable
readyForUse --> inUse : activate message using graphic
note  on link
  Consistency check rules for message 
  activation are defined in Clause 4.3.5
end note

inUse : event set(dmsGraphicStatus)/ inconsistentValue
inUse : event set(any data for graphic)/ notWritable
inUse : event activate another message using graphic/
inUse --> readyForUse : activate message not using graphic

permanent : event set(dmsGraphicStatus)/ inconsistentValue
permanent : event set(any data for graphic)/ notWritable
permanent : event activate a message using graphic/
@enduml

children.text:
@startuml
state switchCentral {
  state central
  central --> local : switchMove(local)
  central : event set(dmsControlMode = any value)/ inconsistentValue
  central : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess [See Note]
}

state switchLocal {
  state local
  state centralOverride

  local --> central : switchMove(central)
  local --> centralOverride : set(dmsControlMode='centralOverride')
  local : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  local : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  local : event set from local(any data)/ process
  local : event set from central(any data other than dmsControlMode)/ noAccess [See Note]

  centralOverride --> central : switchMove(central)
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = 'centralOverride')/ 
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  centralOverride : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess [See Note]
}

note right of switchLocal
  If the request included a SET on dmsActivateMessageV4.0, 
  the DMS shall also update the value of dmsActivateMsgError 
  to 'centralOverrideMode', shall update the value of 
  dmsActivateErrorMsgCodeV4 to the message code sent in the 
  request, and update the value of dmsMultiSyntaxError to 
  'none'.
end note

@enduml

attributesChanged.text:
@startuml
state switchLocal {
  state local
  state centralOverride

  local : event set from local(any data)/ process
  local : event set from central(any data other than dmsControlMode)/ notWritable
  local : event read from local OR central(any data)/ process
  local : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  local --> centralOverride : set(dmsControlMode='centralOverride')
  local --> central : switchMove(central)

  centralOverride : event set from central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from local(any data)/ notWritable
  centralOverride : event read from local OR central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = 'centralOverride')/ 
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  centralOverride --> central : switchMove(central)

}
state switchCentral {
  state central
  central : event set from central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from local(any data)/ notWritable
  central : event read from local OR central(any data)/ process
  central : event set(dmsControlMode = any value)/ inconsistentValue
  central --> local : switchMove(local)
}

@enduml

@startuml
state switchCentral {
  state central
  central --> local : switchMove(local)
  central : event set(dmsControlMode = any value)/ inconsistentValue
  central : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess
}

state switchLocal {
  state local
  state centralOverride

  local --> central : switchMove(central)
  local --> centralOverride : set(dmsControlMode='centralOverride')
  local : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  local : event set from local(any data)/ process
  local : event set from central(any data other than dmsControlMode)/ notWritable
  local : event read from local OR central(any data)/ process

  centralOverride : event set from central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from local(any data)/ notWritable
  centralOverride : event read from local OR central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = 'centralOverride')/ 
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  centralOverride --> central : switchMove(central)

}

@enduml

@startuml
state switchCentral {
  state central
  central --> local : switchMove(local)
  central : event set(dmsControlMode = any value)/ inconsistentValue
  central : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess [See Note]
}

state switchLocal {
  state local
  state centralOverride

  local --> central : switchMove(central)
  local --> centralOverride : set(dmsControlMode='centralOverride')
  local : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  local : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  local : event set from local(any data)/ process
  local : event set from central(any data other than dmsControlMode)/ noAccess [See Note]

  centralOverride --> central : switchMove(central)
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = 'centralOverride')/ 
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  centralOverride : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess [See Note]
}

note as Note
  

@enduml

@startuml
state switchCentral {
  state central
  central --> local : switchMove(local)
  central : event set(dmsControlMode = any value)/ inconsistentValue
  central : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from central(any data)/ process
  central : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess [See Note]
}

state switchLocal {
  state local
  state centralOverride

  local --> central : switchMove(central)
  local --> centralOverride : set(dmsControlMode='centralOverride')
  local : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  local : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  local : event set from local(any data)/ process
  local : event set from central(any data other than dmsControlMode)/ noAccess [See Note]

  centralOverride --> central : switchMove(central)
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = 'centralOverride')/ 
  centralOverride : event set(dmsControlMode = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
  centralOverride : event get from local OR central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from central(any data)/ process
  centralOverride : event set from local(any data)/ noAccess [See Note]
}

note as Note
  If the request included a SET on dmsActivateMessageV4.0, 
  the DMS shall also update the value of dmsActivateMsgError 
  to 'centralOverrideMode', shall update the value of 
  dmsActivateErrorMsgCodeV4 to the message code sent in the 
  request, and update the value of dmsMultiSyntaxError to 
  'none'.
end note

@enduml

children.text:
@startuml
state notUsed
notUsed : entry/ may discard row data
notUsed : event set(any data for row)/ inconsistentValue
notUsed : event set(status = notUsedReq)/
notUsed : event set(status = modifyReq)[insufficientMemory]/ resourceUnavailable
notUsed : event set(status = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
notUsed --> modifying : set(status=modifyReq)[enough memory]

modifying : event set(any data for row)/ process
modifying : event set(status = modifyReq)/
modifying : event set(status = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
modifying --> notUsed : set(status = notUsedReq)
modifying --> validating : set(status = validateReq) 

validating : do/ Consistency check
validating : event set(any data for row)/ inconsistentValue
validating : event set(status = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
validating --> notUsed : set(status = notUsedReq)
validating --> valid : [data valid] dmsValidateMessageError == none
validating --> error : [data invalid] dmsValidateMessageError != none

valid : event set(any data for row)/ inconsistentValue
valid : event set(status = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
valid --> notUsed : set(status = notUsedReq)
valid --> modifying : set(status=modifyReq)

error : event set(any data for row)/ inconsistentValue
error : event set(status = any other value)/ inconsistentValue
error --> notUsed : set(status = notUsedReq)
error --> modifying : set(status=modifyReq)

note as N1
  Diagram is only valid for volatile, 'changeable', and 'schedule' messages. 
  All other message types shall always be in the 'va;id' state and return a 
  'badValue' error for any set command to the dmsMessageStatus object.
  activation are defined in Clause 4.3.5
end note

@enduml
